title: Hedgehog Cookies
ingredients: Mini chocolate chips for eyes and nose
instructions: Beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Add flour, chopped almonds, and vanilla. Shape dough into small ovals (hedgehog bodies) with a pointed end for nose. Insert sliced almonds at an angle into the body to create spines. Add mini chocolate chips for eyes and nose. Bake at 350° for 12-15 minutes until lightly golden.
